item.title: Fly tipping, graffiti, too many bins, rubbish not being put in correct bins, run down HMO, 26th January
item.description:
I’ve turned a blind eye to the problems but fed up after years. It’s an HMO with people who shout thru the night, drunk, on drugs, mental health issues, too many bins than necessary, rubbish disposed of in wrong bins so not collected, mattresses, electric bikes, ironing boards, dumped. The owner doesn’t care cos he can’t get planning to turn to flats. It’s sad cos the building is falling into ruin. Can’t someone turn it into a pub or flats? Come on Southwark sort it out. It’s been empty since 2012. It’s going to ruin. Such a waste. It’s got planning for more HMOs so guess they’ll be more bins and inconsiderate neighbours.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 43, Lyndhurst Grove, Peckham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:
